tests.name: DELIMITED in/out
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, b BYTES) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT * FROM TEST;

tests.name: JSON in/out
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, b BYTES) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT * FROM TEST;

tests.name: bytes in complex types
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, S STRUCT<B BYTES>, A ARRAY<BYTES>, M MAP<STRING, BYTES>) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM TEST2 AS SELECT ID, S -> B AS S, A[1] AS A, M['B'] AS M FROM TEST;
